Package Car

Class Summary
Acceleration is the component responsible of communicating with the Symbian C++ acceleration daemon.
Calllog is the component responsible of communicating with the Symbian C++ calllog daemon.
DayJorTable the class diplay the journey's statistics per day.
driverMidlet This is the main class (MIDlet) were the j2me application starts executing
FileConnectionClass the class is created to get all the speed and journeys data saved in riskometer record stores.
JorTable the class diplay the journey's statistics per journey.
Journey the class represents journey variables.
JournyRecordStore the class manage fetching journeys information from the database.
KeyCapture is the component responsible of communicating with the Symbian C++ KeyCapture daemon.
mainview the class display important statistics about the danger assosiated with using mobiles while driving.
mainviewRiskoOverall Display Risk's statistics over all journeys the user took.
mainviewRiskoOverLastJourny Display Risk's statistics over the last journey the user took.
Point Point class is to create an object of type point to enable saving of vector of points.
Retriever the class responsible of communicating with the mobile gps to get speed update.
Riskitems calculates risk value for every risk factor.
RiskView the class diplay risk view which include the three risk factors.
Speedinfo repesent the speed information we save in the record store.
SpeedJournyRiskView The class manage displaying the journy and speed statistics based on all journys or for a specific journy.
SpeedRecordStore the class manage fetching speed information from the database.
speedTable Display speed statistics.
StartScreen shows driver riskometer logo.
SuJorTable the class display statistics over all journeys.
ToAcceptGPS is used to let the use accept using gps data at the start of the application.
Watcher is the component responsible of communicating with the Symbian C++ Watcher daemon.
